title: holofnightt
author: holofnightt
content: Hi! We verify most of the services, here are some of them:Binance = from $50Paxful = from $50Skrill = from $60Neteller = from $60Astroproxy = $20IPRoyal = $20Soax = $30Not all the services that we check are listed here, so if you need any others, contact telegram https://t.me/shevelynemilewisOur website: https://verifshop.com/Rules and guarantee1. We are not responsible for your funds on the account.2. After the transfer of the account, the responsibility for blocking lies solely with its buyer.3. If additional information/additional verification is requested, we will try to help you, but we cannot guarantee success.4. We are not responsible for unsuccessful verification on an account that has any material value.5. There is no refund after the account is issued.All the people who verify these accounts get paid for their work

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: holofnightt on April 22, 2023, 09:37:25 AM1. We are not responsible for your funds on the account.I like the fact that you at least are honest about this.Plus: I am not convinced that this is a legal service, hence I would not rule out this topic getting removed.
